type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.ScalaSourceSet
type.description: A ScalaSourceSetConvention defines the properties and methods added to a org.gradle.api.tasks.SourceSet by the ScalaPlugin.

method.name: getAllScala
method.description:
All Scala source for this source set.

returns:the Scala source. Never returns null.

method.name: getScala
method.description:
Returns the source to be compiled by the Scala compiler for this source set. This may contain both Java and Scala source files.

returns:The Scala source. Never returns null.

method.name: scala
method.description:
Configures the Scala source for this set.

The given closure is used to configure the SourceDirectorySet which contains the Scala source.
param:configureClosure The closure to use to configure the Scala source.

returns:this

property.name: allScala
property.description:
All Scala source for this source set.

returns:the Scala source. Never returns null.

property.name: scala
property.description:
Returns the source to be compiled by the Scala compiler for this source set. This may contain both Java and Scala source files.

returns:The Scala source. Never returns null.
